name: #WeeklyGameJam 72 - Finish Line
description:
Unfinished prototype for Weekly Game Jam 72 - Finish Line.

Getting back into making game in JavaScript.

Trying to make mobile friendly one-touch game, click to stop rotating and move in the direction of the cursor. Click again to stop and start rotating again.

Ideally the red squares would kill you, and the goal would be to reach the "gates" or finish lines.

After reaching a gate, a new one would appear and you would be given time. Collect as many gates as you can in a given time.

Optional challenges or alternative scoring could include limiting the amount of clicks or "taps" the user performs in a given level.
